text: Patrick Mihai Petre (born 9 May 1997) is a Romanian professional footballer who plays as a winger for Liga III club Dacia Unirea Brăila.A ajuns pe mâna tatălui! Patrick Petre şi-a găsit echipă după despărţirea de Farul. liga2.prosport.ro ==Club career== Petre joined Dinamo București at the age of 6 and gradually progressed through the various youth teams. On October 31, 2014, at the age of seventeen, he made his Liga I debut in a 3-0 loss to rivals Steaua București. In the summer of 2017, after falling down the pecking order at Dinamo, Petre went on a season-long loan to newly promoted club Sepsi Sfântu Gheorghe. In July 2018, Petre was transferred to another Liga I club, the highly aspiring Politehnica Iași, where he was requested by his former Dinamo manager, Flavius Stoican. ==Personal life== Patrick Petre is the son of former Romanian international and Dinamo București legend, Florentin Petre. ==References== ==External links== * *Patrick Petre at Romaniansoccer Category:1997 births Category:Sportspeople from Bucharest Category:Living people Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Liga I players Category:FC Dinamo București players Category:Sepsi OSK Sfântu Gheorghe players Category:FC Politehnica Iași (2010) players Category:Liga II players Category:FC Farul Constanța players Category:ACS Dacia Unirea Brăila players
title: Patrick Petre
